name: Instant Pot Sooji Halwa - Rava Sheera
description: Instant Pot Sooji Halwa - Rava Kesari / Sheera. Vegan Indian Spoon Fudge. Add pineapple or bananas for Pineapple or Banana Sheera. Can be nutfree, glutenfree
recipeIngredient: 1/8 tsp salt (, 1/4 tsp if using oil)

recipeInstructions.text: Press saute on the Instant Pot. When hot, add vegan butter or oil. Add cashews and roast for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Press saute on the Instant Pot. When hot, add vegan butter or oil. Add cashews and roast for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dates and roast for half a minute. Add the semolina and cook for 2 mins, stirring occasionally. The semolina will start to get puffy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dates and roast for half a minute. Add the semolina and cook for 2 mins, stirring occasionally. The semolina will start to get puffy.

recipeInstructions.text: Switch off saute. Add the sugar, salt, cardamom and saffron and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Switch off saute. Add the sugar, salt, cardamom and saffron and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water and mix well. You can also add 1/2 cup finely chopped pineapple or banana at this point to make pineapple kesari or banana kesari.
recipeInstructions.name: Add water and mix well. You can also add 1/2 cup finely chopped pineapple or banana at this point to make pineapple kesari or banana kesari.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix to pick up all the semolina from the bottom and the sides. Mix for a few seconds so the sugar dissolves.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix to pick up all the semolina from the bottom and the sides. Mix for a few seconds so the sugar dissolves.

recipeInstructions.text: Close the lid, pressure cook for 3 mins. Release the pressure after 10 mins
recipeInstructions.name: Close the lid, pressure cook for 3 mins. Release the pressure after 10 mins

recipeInstructions.text: Mix and Fluff and serve garnished with a pinch of ground cardamom and almond, pistachio slivers.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix and Fluff and serve garnished with a pinch of ground cardamom and almond, pistachio slivers.
